amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed printed in House Report 115-430 to provide additional notification to supervisor with 1 year, 6 months, 3 months and 30 days of remaining probationary period.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gianforte amendment (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Gianforte amendment (A002) modified by unanimous consent.
